section_title: IPCC guidelines for national greenhouse gas inventories
sentences: This issue ( FCCC/SBSTA/2009/MISC.3 ) was first considered by the SBSTA plenary on 2 June.
It was referred to informal consultations, co-chaired by Riitta Pipatti (Finland) and Hongwei Yang (China).
The SBSTA closing plenary adopted conclusions on 10 June.
